item.title: A Beautiful Mind: Brian Wilson, R.I.P.
item.description: What the driving creative force behind the Beach Boys gave to the world, and to me.

item.title: The Media Construct Their Own Reality for Trans Athletes
item.description: The Biles-Gaines clash yields a staggeringly false claim in USA Today .

item.title: Why Amazon’s Wheel of Time Failed
item.description: Instead of adapting the story as it is, the writers of the now-canceled show decided they had more important things to say.

item.title: The Courts Botch the Trump Tariffs Case
item.description: The Federal Circuit should have suspended the tariffs while the litigation goes forward.

item.title: UFO Whistleblowers Were a Trap All Along
item.description: The U.S. government hasn’t been covering up alien visitation of Earth. It has been covering up its own use of UFO lore to keep military secrets hidden...
